console

Class InterfaceConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • console.InterfaceConsole

  • public class InterfaceConsole
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the player interaction with the game in console mode.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • InterfaceConsole

        public InterfaceConsole()

    • Method Detail

      • readGameMode

        public static int readGameMode()
        Returns the game mode. If 1 the dragon doesn't move. If 2, the dragon moves but doesn't sleep. If 3, the dragon moves and sleeps.
        Returns:
        Game mode.

      • readMazeSize

        public static int readMazeSize()
        Reads the maze size using a Scanner.
        Returns:
        The maze size.

      • readDirection

        public static java.lang.String readDirection()
        Reads the direction the player wants the hero to move to or if the Eagle is to be launched.
        Returns:
        W if up, S if down, A if left, D if right and L to launch eagle.

      • readDrakeNumber

        public static int readDrakeNumber()
        Reads the number of dragons to be in the game.
        Returns:
        the number of dragons.

      • lostTheGame

        public static void lostTheGame()
        Prints a message if the game is lost.

      • wonTheGame

        public static void wonTheGame()
        Prints a message if the game is won.
